mapper.insert:
SELECT REPLACE(UUID(),'-','')
insert into product (id,Season,Sku,Project,Product_Name,Supplier,Param_Data,Description,Photo,Create_Time,Update_Time) values
(#{item.id}, #{item.season}, #{item.sku},#{item.project}, #{item.productName},#{item.supplier},#{item.paramData},#{item.description},#{item.photo},now(),#{item.updateTime})
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE Season = values (season), Sku=values (Sku), Project=values (Project), Product_Name=values (Product_Name), Supplier=values (Supplier), Param_Data=values (Param_Data), Description=values (Description), Photo=values (Photo), Create_Time=values (Create_Time), Update_Time=now()
